text: Jessica Kate Meyer is an American retired actress, who has appeared in The Pianist, and was later ordained as a rabbi. ==Films== *The Pianist as Halina Szpilman (2002) *Al sur de Granada as Dora Carrington (2003) *Rise of the Damned as Kellie (2011) ==Television== *Scrubs (2004) *Mrs. Harris (2005) ==References== Category:American actresses Category:American rabbis Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Jessica Kate Meyer
